instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Boardview for Apple MacBook "Core M" 1.1 12" (Early 2015)
threads.message:
Hey everybody,

I am having display issues on a Apple MacBook "Core M" 1.1 12" (Early 2015), the computer turns on fine and you can here it when you use the volume up-down. However, I am struggling very much to find:

a) The board serial number
b) A boardview/schematic for the board

The only serial-type number I have found is on the keyboard connector, 821-1935, however I don't believe this to be the correct number. I am unable to find any other numbers like the usual board serials on there.

So my questions are:
a) Where can I find the board serial number on a Apple MacBook "Core M" 1.1 12" (Early 2015)
b) Any cheeky pointers to where I could source a schematic would be appreciated but not expected :)

Thanks

threads.title: Boardview for Apple MacBook "Core M" 1.1 12" (Early 2015)
threads.message: This should be a 820-00045. If you can't find it with Google let me know and I can look it up and send you a DM.

threads.title: Boardview for Apple MacBook "Core M" 1.1 12" (Early 2015)
threads.message: Thanks for that Duke. I've managed to source a schematic
